bug.question: I have spots and I'm red. I can fly. What am I?

hints.text: 🔴 I'm often found on leaves!
⚫ I have lots of little dots!
🪰 I can flutter my wings!

bug.question: I make honey. I buzz around flowers. What am I?

hints.text: 🌼 I love to collect nectar.
🟡 I am usually yellow and black.
🎵 I make a buzzing sound.

bug.question: I hop around. I am green and long-legged. What am I?

hints.text: 🌿 I like to hide in the grass.
🦵 I use my legs to jump very high.
🦗 I chirp in the summer.

bug.question: I carry food on my back. I live in a colony. What am I?

hints.text: 💪 I'm very strong for my size.
🏠 I live with lots of my friends and family.
🐜 I am a very common insect.

bug.question: I spin a web. I have eight legs. What am I?

hints.text: 🕸️ My home is sticky.
🕷️ I have more legs than you!
🪰 I catch other bugs in my home.

bug.question: I start as a caterpillar then turn into something beautiful with wings. What am I?

hints.text: 🐛 I eat lots of leaves when I am young.
🌈 I have colorful wings.
🦋 I fly around in the sunshine.

bug.question: I glow in the dark at night. What am I?

hints.text: 💡 My light helps me find friends.
🌃 You can see me in the summertime.
✨ I light up with a natural glow.

bug.question: I can walk on water. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I have special feet that let me float!
🌊 I am often found on ponds and lakes.
🐾 I have six legs.

bug.question: I eat wood. I can damage houses. What am I?

hints.text: 🪵 I can chew through trees!
🏘️ I live in groups and can cause damage to wooden structures.
🐜 I am small, pale and related to ants.

bug.question: I can change colors to blend in with my surroundings. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I like to hide in trees and bushes.
🎨 I can change my color like magic.
🍃 I am good at camouflage.

animal.question: I say 'Meow!' and love to play with yarn. What am I?

hints.text: 🥛 I like to drink milk.
🧶 I chase after string.
🐈‍⬛ I have soft fur and whiskers.

animal.question: I go 'Woof! Woof!' and wag my tail. What am I?

hints.text: 🦴 I love to chew on bones.
🎾 I like to play fetch.
🏡 I protect your house.

animal.question: I say 'Quack! Quack!' and swim in the pond. What am I?

hints.text: 🌾 I eat seeds and plants.
🦆 I have webbed feet.
💧 I like to swim in the water.

animal.question: I like to eat honey and live in a hive. What am I?

hints.text: 🐝 I make a buzzing sound.
🌼 I fly from flower to flower.
🍯 I make sweet, sticky treats.

animal.question: I have a long trunk and big ears. What am I?

hints.text: 🥜 I love to eat peanuts.
🐘 I am very big and gray.
💦 I can spray water with my nose.

animal.question: I hop around and love to eat carrots. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I have long ears.
🐰 I like to jump.
🌱 I eat green plants in the garden.

animal.question: I have black and white stripes. What am I?

hints.text: 🦓 I live in Africa.
🐎 I look like a horse.
🌈 My coat has a very unique pattern.

animal.question: I roar loudly and am the king of the jungle. What am I?

hints.text: 👑 I have a big mane.
🐾 I am a large cat.
🦁 I live in Africa and India.

animal.question: I am a tall animal with a very long neck. What am I?

hints.text: 🌿 I eat leaves from tall trees.
🦒 I have spots on my body.
🌳 It is easy for me to eat in the forest.

animal.question: I swing from trees and love to eat bananas. What am I?

hints.text: 🐒 I like to chatter and play.
🌴 I live in the jungle.
🍌 I use my long arms to swing around.
